name: MyPrayerClock
0:
”Alexa, ask My Prayer Clock What time is Asar prayer”
”Alexa, ask My Prayer Clock to Set a reminder for Zohar prayer”
”Alexa, ask My Prayer Clock to recite Surah Rahman.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my prayer clock
des:
My Prayer Clock allows you to use Alexa to get Muslim prayer times, all prayer times, get the next prayer name or time, and set reminders when it's time to pray. Prayer reminders apply for the current day's prayers, for specific prayers or all prayers and play the azaan, recite the Quran, ask for a name of Allah. You can also get Hanafi timings by adding the work "Hanafi" at the end of your request.

Also has the full Quran Surahs in English!

supported example utterances are:
1. what time is Zohar prayer?
2. what is the next prayer?
3. when is Isha prayer Hanafi? (Hanafi optional)
4. set a reminder for Asr prayer.
5. set reminders for today's prayers.
6. when is the next prayer?
7. play the azaan
8. recite the Quran
9. tell me a name of God
10. recite surah Rahman (or surahs Ya-sin, Fatiha, Baqarah, Muzammil, Kafirun, Ikhlas, Nas, Falaq, or Mulk)
11. Read Surah Number (surah number 1 to 114)
